GK20ruysahlu:0: śrīmatām utkarṣaparijñānād vaidagdhyena sahṛdayatvān nāgarikatāsiddhiḥ / yuvatyādīnām utkarṣo dehe\var{dehe\lem \ed;
GK20ruysahlu:1: deha# \ka} guṇālaṅkārajīvitaparikarebhyaḥ / tatra śobhāvidhāyino dharmā guṇāḥ /
GK20ruysahlu:2: 1ab: rūpaṃ varṇaḥ prabhā rāga & ābhijātyaṃ vilāsitā
GK20ruysahlu:3: 1cd: lāvaṇyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ chāyā & saubhāgyaṃ cety amī guṇāḥ
GK20ruysahlu:4: avayavānāṃ rekhāspāṣṭyaṃ rūpaṃ / gauratādidharmaviśeṣo varṇaḥ / kācakācyarūpā\var{kācakācya#\lem \ed;
GK20ruysahlu:6_0: naisargikaḥ \kha}smeratvamukhaprasādādiḥ sarveṣām eva cakṣurbandhako dharmo rāgaḥ /
GK20ruysahlu:6_1: kusumadharmā mārdavādir lālanādirūpaḥ sparśaviśeṣaḥ peśalatākhya ābhijātyam / aṅgopāṅgānāṃ
GK20ruysahlu:6_4: pūrṇenduvadāhlādako dharmaḥ saṃsthānamugdhimavyaṅgyo lāvaṇyam / aṅgopāṅgānām asādhāraṇaśobhāprāśastyahetur
GK20ruysahlu:6_9: vaśīkartā sahṛdayasaṃvedyadharmabhedaś ca saubhāgyam / tatrādye smaramadapulakādayo
GK20ruysahlu:9: 2cd: prakīrṇaṃ cety alaṅkārāḥ & saptaiv[ai]te mayā matāḥ
GK20ruysahlu:13: prālamba+mālikā+āhāra+nakṣatramālā+prabhṛtir āropyaḥ / caturdhā+aṃśuka+mayaḥ / tvak+phala+krimi+romajatvāt krameṇa kṣauma+kārpāsa+kauśeya+rāṅkava+ādibhedāt / punas tridhā,
GK20ruysahlu:14_1: prakṣepyaḥ kañculika+ādiḥ / āropya uttarīya+paṭa+ādiḥ / sarvasya+ asya+ anekavidhatvaṃ
GK20ruysahlu:14_2: varṇa+vicchitti+nānātvāt / grathita+agrathita+vaśād dvividhaḥ sann aṣṭadhā mālya+mayaḥ /
GK20ruysahlu:14_4: tatra+ udvartitaṃ veṣṭitam / pārśvato vistāritaṃ vitatam / bahubhiḥ puṣpaiḥ samūhena
GK20ruysahlu:14_5: racitaṃ saṃghātyam / antarāntarā viṣamaṃ granthimat / spaṣṭombhitam (?)
GK20ruysahlu:15_0: avalambham / kevalaṃ muktakaḥ / aneka+puṣpa+mayī latā mañjarī / kusuma+gulucchaṃ
GK20ruysahlu:16_1: niveśyaḥ / etat samavāyo veṣaḥ / sa ca deśa+kāla+prakṛti+avasthā+sātmyena / eteṣāṃ
GK20ruysahlu:18_0: śobhāyās+ anuprāṇakaṃ yauvana+ākhyaṃ jīvitam / bālya+anantaram gātrāṇāṃ vaipulya+sauṣṭhava+vibhaktatā+vidhāyī
GK20ruysahlu:18_1: sphuṭita+dāḍima+upamaḥ smara+vasatir avasthā+bhedo yauvanam / tasya vayaḥ+saṃdhir
GK20ruysahlu:18_3: āvartamānāś ceṣṭāḥ / antye tu śṛṅgāra+anubhāva+tāratamyaṃ śreyaḥ //
GK20ruysahlu:20_0: śobhāyās+ ārād upakārakatvād vyañjakaḥ parikaraḥ / tasya cetana+acetanayoḥ sthāṇu+calayoḥ
